text: ane je hijarata karanara tatha ansara, pahelavahela imana lavya che, ane je loko nikhalasatathi temanum anusarana kare che, allaha ta'ala te sau lokothi raji thayo ane te sau allahathi raji thaya ane allaha'e temana mate eva bagica'o taiyara kari rakhya che, jeni nice nahero vahi rahi hase, jemam hammesa rahese, a bhavya saphalata che
